Module.name: FPDMGEO4
Module.comment: is the Forward Pion Detector Modules GEOmetry
Module.Content: FBOX,FTOW,FLXF,FWAL,FLGR,FPCT,FUMT, PBPT,FSHM,FHMS,FXGT,FALU,FBAS,FENC, FEAC,FEBC,FECC,FEDC,FETC,FERC,FESC, FEEC,FPRS,FPLY,FPPB,FPSC,FPBB, FLIG,FLBA,FLCO,FPMT,FFEE, FLLG,FBLL,FCLL, WPPL,WPIS,WPUF,WPUN,WPUS,WPAR

var.name: X
var.comment: X distance from beam to edge of detector

var.name: Y
var.comment: Y distance from beam to edge of detector

var.name: Z
var.comment: Z distance from IP to surface of detector

var.name: AY
var.comment: Angle aroound Y (0 for west, 180 for east)

var.name: X
var.comment: X distance from beam to edge of detector

var.name: Y
var.comment: Y distance from beam to edge of detector

var.name: Z
var.comment: Z distance from IP to surface of detector

var.name: AY
var.comment: Angle aroound Y (0 for west, 180 for east)

var.name: X
var.comment: X distance from beam to edge of detector

var.name: Y
var.comment: Y distance from beam to edge of detector

var.name: Z
var.comment: Z distance from IP to surface of detector

var.name: AY
var.comment: Angle aroound Y (0 for west, 180 for east)

var.name: X
var.comment: X distance from beam to edge of detector

var.name: Y
var.comment: Y distance from beam to edge of detector

var.name: Z
var.comment: Z distance from IP to surface of detector

var.name: AY
var.comment: Angle aroound Y (0 for west, 180 for east)

var.name: NXL
var.comment: Number of large pbg in x

var.name: NYL
var.comment: number of large pbg in y

var.name: XOffset
var.comment: tower x offset from box edge to PbG edge

var.name: ZOffset
var.comment: tower z offset from box edge to PbG edge

var.name: PSOffset
var.comment: PreShower z offset from box edge to PbG edge

var.name: SmdOff
var.comment: SMD V-plane z offset from box edge

var.name: NXL
var.comment: Number of large pbg in x

var.name: NYL
var.comment: number of large pbg in y

var.name: XOffset
var.comment: tower x offset from box edge to PbG edge

var.name: ZOffset
var.comment: tower z offset from box edge to PbG edge

var.name: PSOffset
var.comment: PreShower z offset from box edge to PbG edge

var.name: SmdOff
var.comment: SMD z offset from box edge

var.name: HoleGap
var.comment: Distance between edge of INSERT and square hole

var.name: GateDepth
var.comment: Depth of one of the three Gates (z)

var.name: GateGap
var.comment: Distance between the back edge of the box and last gate

var.name: Ra
var.comment: Radius of the inner circle of tubes

var.name: Rb
var.comment: Radius of the outer circle of tubes

var.name: RMax
var.comment: Radius of the inner tube for beampipe

Module.Fill:
! 1=narrow, 2=wide, 3=gap
! virtical bottom will be shorter due to constrain from floor ! 1=size of SiPM, 2=height for cone, 3=height for base ! 1=thickness for board, 2=width, 3=length, 4=length for FEE board ! dz(thickness) of back board ! backboard 1=inside extend, 2=outside extend
Module.Do:
wid = FLGG_Width + FLGG_DGap + FLGG_AlThick*2.0 ztot = (FLGG_Depth + FLGG_AlThick + FLGG_MuMetDz)/2.0 rtot = FBXD_NX*wid/2.0 bwid = rtot+FBXD_XOffset
wid = FLGG_Width + FLGG_DGap + FLGG_AlThick*2.0 ztot = (FLGG_Depth + FLGG_AlThick + FLGG_MuMetDz)/2.0 rtot = FBXD_NXL*wid/2.0 bwid = rtot
bwid=FBXD_Width/2.0
xx=FPOS_X+bwid
xx=0.0
xx=FPOS_X-bwid
xx=FPOS_X+bwid
xx=0.0
xx=FPOS_X-bwid
yy=FPOS_Y+FBXD_Height/2.0
yy=0.0
yy=FPOS_Y-FBXD_Height/2.0
zz=FPOS_Z+FBXD_Depth/2.0
zz=FPOS_Z-FBXD_Depth/2.0
serN=0
serN=1
Module.Block:
widL = FLGG_Width + FLGG_DGap + FLGG_AlThick*2.0
wid = FLGG_Width + FLGG_DGap + FLGG_AlThick*2.0 ztot = (FLGG_Depth + FLGG_AlThick + FLGG_MuMetDz)/2.0 rtot = FBXD_NX*wid/2.0 bwid = rtot-FBXD_XOffset
x0 = - rtot - FBXD_XOffset + wid/2.0 widx = wid
x0 = rtot + FBXD_XOffset - wid/2.0 widx = -wid
y1 = FBXD_NY*wid/2.0 - wid/2.0 + (16*widL-FBXD_NY*wid)/2.0 widy = wid+(16.0*widL-FBXD_NY*wid)/23.0
y1 = FBXD_NY*wid/2.0 - wid/2.0 widy = wid
z1 = -FBXD_Depth/2.0 + FBXD_ZOffset + ztot
x1=x0
x1=x1+widx
x1=x1+widx
y1 = y1-widy
x1=x0 y1= -rtot + ztot z1=-FBXD_Depth/2.0 + FBXD_PSOffset + wid/2.0
x1=x1-wid
ztotsmd=FMXG_G10Thick+FMXG_Sapex
wid = FLGG_Width + FLGG_DGap + FLGG_AlThick*2.0 ztot = FLGG_Depth/2.0 rtot = FBXD_NXL*wid/2.0 bwid = rtot xlcOffSet = (FBXD_Width-FBXD_NXL*wid)/2.0 ! Large Cells OffSet in X
x0 = -bwid + wid/2.0 - xlcOffSet widx = wid
x0 = +bwid - wid/2.0 + xlcOffSet widx = -wid
y1 = FBXD_NYL*wid/2.0 - wid/2.0 z1 = -FBXD_Depth/2.0 + FBXD_ZOffset + ztot
x1=x0
x1=x1+widx
x1=x1+widx
x1=x1+widx
x1=x1+widx
y1=y1-wid
BZOffSet=0.0 wid = FLGG_Width + FLGG_DGap basewidth=1.0
distancer=INSE_GapHeight-(INSE_Height-2.0*INSE_SheetDpt) xoffFECC=(INSE_SheetDpt-FBXD_Width)/2.0 zoffFECC=-FBXD_Depth/2.0+BZOffSet+INSE_Depth-INSE_GateGap xoffFEDC=INSE_Width - INSE_SheetDpt xoffFENC=(INSE_Width-FBXD_Width)/2.0 yoffFENC=(INSE_Height-INSE_SheetDpt)/2.0 zoffFENC=-FBXD_Depth/2.0 + BZOffSet + INSE_Depth/2.0 xshift=8*5.812-12*3.822+5*3.822-INSE_Width !this is to move insert to small cell edge

Block.name: FEDC
Block.comment: is Steel Enclosure part on south

Block.name: FEEC
Block.comment: is Steel Enclosure part on north

Module.Block:
wsmd=FMXG_Sbase/2.0+FMXG_Sgap wtotsmd=(FMXG_Nstrip+1)*wsmd zsmd=-ztotsmd+FMXG_G10Thick/2.0
xsmdv=-wtotsmd/2.0-FMXG_Sgap/2.0+wsmd ysmdv=0.0 zsmdv=zsmd+FMXG_G10Thick/2.0+FMXG_Sapex/2.0
xsmdv=xsmdv+wsmd
zsmd2=zsmdv+FMXG_G10Thick/2.0+FMXG_Sapex/2.0
xsmdh=0.0 ysmdh=-wtotsmd/2.0-FMXG_Sgap/2.0+wsmd zsmdh=zsmd2+FMXG_G10Thick/2.0+FMXG_Sapex/2.0
ysmdh=ysmdh+wsmd

Block.name: FXGT
Block.comment: is the G10 layer in the SMax

Block.name: FPRS
Block.comment: is box for plastic schinti FMS pre-shower detectors

Module.Block:
debug=0
npstype=0 cpstype(1)=1 cpstype(2)=2 cpstype(3)=6 cpstype(4)=3 cpstype(5)=4 cpstype(6)=7 cpstype(7)=5 cpstype(8)=8 open(11,file='fpsgeom.txt',status='REPLACE')
serN=1 dx=PRSW_DBox(1)/2.0 dy=PRSW_DBox(2)/2.0 dz=PRSW_Dz(1)/2.0+PRSW_DzBbd(1)/2.0+PRSW_DSIPM(1)/2.0 zz=-PRSW_Dbox(3)/2.0+dz
serN=2 dx=PRSW_DBox(1)/2.0 dy=PRSW_DBox(2)/2.0 dz=PRSW_Dz(2)/2.0+PRSW_DzBbd(2)/2.0+PRSW_DSIPM(1)/2.0 zz=-PRSW_Dbox(3)/2.0+dz+PRSW_Zoff(2)-PRSW_Zoff(1)
serN=3 dx=PRSW_DBox(1)/2.0 dy=PRSW_DBox(2)/2.0 dz=PRSW_Dz(3)/2.0+PRSW_DzBbd(3)/2.0 zz=-PRSW_Dbox(3)/2.0+PRSW_DSIPM(1)+dz-PRSW_DzBbd(3)/2.0+PRSW_Zoff(3)-PRSW_Zoff(1) dzsb = PRSW_Dz(3)/2.0+PRSW_DzBbd(3)/4.0
serN=4 dx=PRSW_DBox(1)/2.0 dy=PRSW_DBox(2)/2.0 dz=PRSW_Dz(4)/2.0+PRSW_DzBbd(4)/2.0+PRSW_DSIPM(1)/2.0 zz=-PRSW_Dbox(3)/2.0+dz+PRSW_DSIPM(1)+PRSW_Zoff(4)-PRSW_Zoff(1)-PRSW_DzBbd(4)
open(10,file='prs.txt',status='REPLACE') k=0
write(*,'(A5,A1,I5,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2)') 'Type=',char(ichar('A')+cpstype(j)-1),pstype(j),psdim(j,1)*2,psdim(j,2)*2,1.0 write(10,'(A5,A1,I5,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2)') 'Type=',char(ichar('A')+cpstype(j)-1),pstype(j),psdim(j,1)*2,psdim(j,2)*2,1.0
k=k+pstype(j)
write(10,*) 'Total=',k close(10) close(11)

Block.name: FPLY
Block.comment: is a layer of FMS Preshower

Module.Block:
lprs1=PRSW_NPrs(1)*(PRSW_DPrs(1)+PRSW_DPrs(3)) lprs2=PRSW_NPrs(2)*(PRSW_DPrs(2)+PRSW_DPrs(3))+lprs1 lprs3=(PRSW_NPrs(2)-PRSW_NSkipH)*(PRSW_DPrs(2)+PRSW_DPrs(3))+lprs1 lprs4=(PRSW_NPrs(1)-PRSW_NSkipV)*(PRSW_DPrs(1)+PRSW_DPrs(3))+PRSW_NPrs(2)*(PRSW_DPrs(2)+PRSW_DPrs(3))
dlg=(PRSW_DLG(2)+PRSW_DLG(3)+PRSW_DSIPM(1))/2.0
k = 0 dzz = PRSW_DZ(serN)/2.0 ! Pb in middle, back plate in front and back z1=0 z2=0 ! back board first for layer3 z1=-dz+PRSW_DzBbd(serN)+dzz ! z for schinti z2=-dz+PRSW_DzBbd(serN)/2.0 ! z for back board
! back board 2nd for layer1,2 z1=-dz+PRSW_DSIPM(1)+dzz ! z for schinti z2=-dz+PRSW_DSIPM(1)+dzz*2+PRSW_DzBbd(serN)/2.0 ! z for back board
z = PRSW_Zoff(serN)
open(1,file='prs1map.txt',status='REPLACE') open(2,file='prs2map.txt',status='REPLACE') open(3,file='prsCmap.txt',status='REPLACE') open(4,file='prs3map.txt',status='REPLACE')
layr=serN
layr=serN-1
x=0.0 quad=(lr-1)*2+tb slat(quad,layr)=0
dxx = PRSW_DPrs(j)/2.0 x = x + dxx + PRSW_DPrs(3)/2.0
pwid=lprs2
pwid=lprs3-PRSW_DyCut
dyy = (pwid-PRSW_DHole)/2.0 y = dyy+PRSW_DHole
dyy = pwid/2.0 y = dyy
yy=y+dyy+dlg rot=0 y=-y; yy=-yy; rot=180 xx=+x+PRSW_Xoff(serN) xx=-x-PRSW_Xoff(serN) y=y+PRSW_Yoff(serN); yy=yy+PRSW_Yoff(serN);
k = k+1 slat(quad,layr)=slat(quad,layr)+1 id=(quad-1)*3*21+(layr-1)*21+(slat(quad,layr)-1) flag=0
flag=kk pstype(kk)=pstype(kk)+1
npstype=npstype+1 flag=npstype pstype(flag)=1
psdim(npstype,1)=dyy psdim(npstype,2)=dxx
psdim(npstype,1)=dxx psdim(npstype,2)=dyy
write(serN,'(I2,I3,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,2X,A1)') serN,k,dxx*2,dyy*2,dzz*2,xx,y,z,char(ichar('A')+cpstype(flag)-1) write(11,'(I3,I2,I2,I3,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2)') id,quad,layr,slat(quad,layr),dxx*2,dyy*2,dzz*2,xx,y,z
x = x + dxx
y=0.0 quad=(lr-1)*2+tb slat(quad,layr)=0
dyy = PRSW_DPrs(j)/2.0 y = y + dyy + PRSW_DPrs(3)/2.0 pwid=lprs2
dxx = (pwid-PRSW_DHole)/2.0 x = dxx+PRSW_DHole
dxx = pwid/2.0 x = dxx
dxx = lprs4/2.0 x = dxx+2*PRSW_DPrs(1)
xx=x+dxx+dlg yy=+y; yy=-y; x=+x+PRSW_Xoff(serN); xx=+xx+PRSW_Xoff(serN); rot=-90 x=-x-PRSW_Xoff(serN); xx=-xx-PRSW_Xoff(serN); rot=90 yy=yy+PRSW_Yoff(serN);
k = k+1 slat(quad,layr)=slat(quad,layr)+1 id=(quad-1)*3*21+(layr-1)*21+(slat(quad,layr)-1) flag=0
flag=kk pstype(kk)=pstype(kk)+1
npstype=npstype+1 flag=npstype pstype(flag)=1
psdim(npstype,1)=dyy psdim(npstype,2)=dxx
psdim(npstype,1)=dxx psdim(npstype,2)=dyy
write(serN,'(I2,I3,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,2X,A1)') serN,k,dxx*2,dyy*2,dzz*2,x,yy,z,char(ichar('A')+cpstype(flag)-1) write(11,'(I3,I2,I2,I3,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2,F8.2)') id,quad,layr,slat(quad,layr),dxx*2,dyy*2,dzz*2,xx,y,z
y = y + dyy
close(serN)
dz1=PRSW_DzBbd(serN)/2.0 dz3=PRSW_Dz(3)+PRSW_DzBbd(3)
dx1=(PRSW_DHole-PRSW_DxBbd(1))/2.0 dy1=(lprs2-PRSW_DHole+PRSW_DxBbd(1)+PRSW_DxBbd(2))/2.0 x2=PRSW_xoff(serN)+dx1 y2=PRSW_DHole-PRSW_DxBbd(1)+dy1 dxx=dx1; dyy=dy1;
dx2=(lprs2-PRSW_DHole+PRSW_DxBbd(1)+PRSW_DxBbd(2))/2.0 dy2=(lprs2+PRSW_DxBbd(2))/2.0 x2=PRSW_xoff(serN)+dx1*2+dx2 y2=dy2 dxx=dx2; dyy=dy2;
dx1a=(PRSW_DHole-PRSW_DxBbd(1)-PRSW_NSkipV*PRSW_Dprs(1))/2.0 dx1b=(PRSW_DHole-PRSW_DxBbd(1))/2.0
dx1=dx1a x2=PRSW_xoff(serN)+PRSW_NSkipV*PRSW_Dprs(1)+dx1
dx1=dx1b x2=PRSW_xoff(serN)+dx1
dy1=(lprs3-PRSW_DHole-PRSW_DyCut+PRSW_DxBbd(1)+PRSW_DxBbd(2))/2.0 y2=PRSW_DHole-PRSW_DxBbd(1)+dy1 dxx=dx1; dyy=dy1;
dx2=(lprs2-PRSW_DHole+PRSW_DxBbd(1)+PRSW_DxBbd(2))/2.0
dx2=(lprs2-PRSW_DHole+PRSW_DxBbd(1)+PRSW_DxBbd(2))/2.0
dy2=(lprs3-PRSW_DyCut+PRSW_DxBbd(2))/2.0 x2=PRSW_xoff(serN)+dx1b*2+dx2 y2=dy2 dxx=dx2; dyy=dy2;

Block.name: FPSC
Block.comment: is a piece of scintillator in FMS Preshower

Block.name: FLIG
Block.comment: is a light guide + SiPM board for Preshower

Block.name: FLLG
Block.comment: is a light guide + SiPM board for Preshower for large

Block.name: FLBA
Block.comment: is a light guide base for Preshower

Block.name: FBLL
Block.comment: is a light guide base for Preshower large

Block.name: FLCO
Block.comment: is a light guide cone for Preshower

Block.name: FCLL
Block.comment: is a light guide cone for Preshower large

Block.name: FPMT
Block.comment: is a SiPM board for Preshower

Block.name: FFEE
Block.comment: is a FEE board for Preshower

Block.name: WPPL
Block.comment: is a pole for west platform

Block.name: WPIS
Block.comment: is a I-struct for west platform

Block.name: WPUF
Block.comment: is a front U-struct for west platform

Block.name: WPUN
Block.comment: is a north U-struct for west platform

Block.name: WPUS
Block.comment: is a south U-struct for west platform
